item.description:
Dance to music by the 18-piece Beantown Swing Orchestra, this time featuring slower, bluesy tunes not usually performed by the band at public dances.

The band plays from 9pm to 12:30am, and there will be a beginner swing dance lesson at 8:30pm. The lesson is a great opportunity for meetup members to meet each other (or at least the meetup members of the opposite sex) because the "followers" rotate through the "leaders" continuously.
item.how_to_find_us: Elizabeth will be teaching the beginner lesson and is also the organizer and hostess of this monthly dance series. Frank will be on stage conducting the band.

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Blues Cafe Dance at Springstep in Medford, Mass.
